hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DEPLOY_AUTOMATICS_ORCHESTRATION
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to deploy Automatics Orchestration in the VM specified below

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_IP_ADDRESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP Address of the VM in which Automatics orchestration Server needs to be deployed

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: AUTOMATICS_VM_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials to Login to the VM in whcih Automatics Orchestration Server to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_SERVER_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port in which Automatics Orchestration tomcat server should be running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_MYSQL_DB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Username of Automatics Mysql DB

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_LOG_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a directory in server VM where Tomcat and Automatics server logs to be persisted. If not given logs will be generated in the default directory

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_DB_IP_ADDRESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP Address of the VM in which Automatics orchestration DB needs to be deployed

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: AUTOMATICS_DB_VM_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials to Login to the VM in whcih Automatics Orchestration DB to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_DB_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port in which Automatics Orchestration database should be running

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Root password for MYSQL DB

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_DB_DATA_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a directory in database VM where the data should be persisted

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DEPLOY_AUTOMATICS_PROPERTIES
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to deploy Automatics properties in the VM specified below

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPS_IP_ADDRESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP Address of the VM in which Automatics properties Server needs to be deployed

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPS_VM_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials to Login to the VM in whcih Automatics properties Server to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPS_SERVER_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port in which Automatics Properties Tomcat server should be running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPS_LOG_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a directory in server VM where Tomcat and Automatics properties server logs to be persisted. If not given logs will be generated in the default directory

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_ORCH_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter Automatics Orcherstration URL to be configured in automatics properties

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter Device Manager URL to be configured in automatics properties

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPS_UI_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Username of Automatics Properties UI

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: AUTOMATICS_PROPS_UI_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Password for Automatics Properties UI

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DEPLOY_DEVICE_MANAGER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to deploy Device Manager in the VM specified below

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_IP_ADDRESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP Address of the VM in which Device Manager Server needs to be deployed

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_VM_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials to Login to the VM in whcih Device Manager Server to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_SERVER_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port in which Device Manager tomcat server should be running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_DB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Username of Automatics Mysql DB

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_LOG_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a directory in server VM where Tomcat and Device Manager server logs to be persisted. If not given logs will be generated in the default directory

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_DB_IP_ADDRESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP Address of the VM in which Device Manager DB needs to be deployed

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_DB_VM_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials to Login to the VM in whcih Device Manager DB to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_DB_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port in which Device Manager database should be running

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Enter the Root password for MYSQL DB of Device Manager

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_SWAGGER_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the public domain details used for accessing device manager application in any of the formats like devicemanager.com or public_ip:port or domain_name:port

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_DB_DATA_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a directory in database VM where the data should be persisted

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DEPLOY_DEVICE_MANAGER_UI
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Tick this checkbox to deploy Device Manager UI in the VM specified below

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_UI_IP_ADDRESS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the IP Address of the VM in which Device Manager UI Server needs to be deployed

com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_UI_VM_CREDENTIALS
com.cloudbees.plugins.credentials.Creden.description: Select or Add credentials to Login to the VM in whcih Device Manager UI Server to be deployed

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_UI_SERVER_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the port in which Device Manager UI Tomcat server should be running

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DEVICE_MANAGER_UI_LOG_DIRECTORY
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter a directory in server VM where Tomcat and Device Manager UI server logs to be persisted. If not given logs will be generated in the default directory
